name: Commandos 2: Men of Courage
notes:
- Recent GOG installer required (v2 or above).
- Uses the Commandos 2+3 GOG installer but only installs Commandos 2.
- Fix for multiplayer by TCP/IP included.
- Movies won't play. You can play them manually from the DATA/WOFIP folder...
- The game may leave fullscreen sometimes, hit Alt+Enter a couple times when it happens.
- The mouse may not be captured well initially, just move it around until the cursor appears and avoid clicking until then.

files.game: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by GOG
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Commandos 2 and 3/Commandos 2/comm2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    app: directplay
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /silent /nogui /components=component0
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
